title: Short info
description: Just a usual 18 y.o boy, born in a great city Kyiv in a greatest family.

title: Where do I study?
description: Currently I study at State University of Telecommunication, my speciality is cybersecurity. I have been studying programming all by myself since 15 y.o. My first language to learn was Java, so I was trying to build some trivial application on Android. Then I spent a lot of time with C# and Unity engine and only after this in 17 y.o. age I started Javascript.

title: Tech Stack
description: Main: React Native, NodeJS. Side: C#(Unity) and a bit of Java.

title: Soft Skills
description: Negotiative, open-minded, Adaptable, Tolerant of change and uncertainty, Willing to learn.

title: Other Skills
description: B2 English certificate and so on.

title: Work experience
description: I had only two positions before. Rewriter and Unity-programmer inter. On both positions I worked for two month.
